sen.j: 河原町御池交差点（かわらまちおいけこうさてん）は、京都府京都市中京区にある交差点。
sen.e: The Kawaramachi Oike Intersection is the intersection located in Nakagyo Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.
sen.cmt: 原文は間違いと思われますが「に位置している。」という一句がセル５にありましたので、削除しました。
sen.e: The Kawaramachi Oike Intersection is the intersection located in Nakagyo Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.
The Kawaramachi Oike Intersection is the intersection located in Nakagyo Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.

sen.j: 北緯35度0分41秒東経135度46分8秒 に位置している。
sen.e: This intersection is located at latitude 35 degrees 0 minute 41 seconds north, 135 degrees 46 minutes 8 seconds of east longitude.
This intersection is located at latitude 35 degrees 0 minute 41 seconds north, 135 degrees 46 minutes 8 seconds of east longitude.
This intersection is located at latitude 35 degrees 0 minute 41 seconds north, 135 degrees 46 minutes 8 seconds of east longitude.

sen.j: 南北方向に伸びる京都府道32号下鴨京都停車場線（河原町通）と、東西方向に伸びる京都府道37号二条停車場東山三条線（御池通）が交差している。
sen.e: The intersection is produced by the crossing of the No. 32 Kyoto Prefectural, Shimogamo Kyoto Station Front Road (Kawaramachi-dori Street) and the No. 37 Kyoto Prefectural, Nijo Station Front Higashiyama Sanjo Road. (Oike-dori Street)

The intersection is produced by the crossing of the No. 32 Kyoto Prefectural, Shimogamo Kyoto Station Front Road (Kawaramachi-dori Street) and the No. 37 Kyoto Prefectural, Nijo Station Front Higashiyama Sanjo Road (Oike-dori Street).
sen.cmt: ピリオド位置を訂正しました。
sen.e: The intersection is produced by the crossing of the No. 32 Kyoto Prefectural, Shimogamo Kyoto Station Front Road (Kawaramachi-dori Street) and the No. 37 Kyoto Prefectural, Nijo Station Front Higashiyama Sanjo Road (Oike-dori Street).

sen.j: 通常は、単に河原町御池と呼ばれる。
sen.e: This intersection is commonly known and called as Kawaramachi Oike.
This intersection is commonly known and called as Kawaramachi Oike.
This intersection is commonly known and called as Kawaramachi Oike.

sen.j: 京都市役所が交差点の北西角にある。
sen.e: There is the Kyoto City Hall at the north-west corner of the intersection.
There is the Kyoto City Hall at the north-west corner of the intersection.
There is the Kyoto City Hall at the north-west corner of the intersection.

sen.j: また、付近は京都ホテルをはじめとしたホテルや老舗旅館が多いほか、交差点地下には地下街のゼスト御池がある。
sen.e: While the surrounding area of this intersection have many hotels including the Kyoto Hotel and other classic Japanese-style hotels, there is also an underground shopping center beneath the intersection called Zest Oike.

While the surrounding area of this intersection have many hotels including the Kyoto Hotel and other classic Japanese-style hotels, there is also an underground shopping center beneath the intersection called Zest Oike.

While the surrounding area of this intersection have many hotels including the Kyoto Hotel and other classic Japanese-style hotels, there is also an underground shopping center beneath the intersection called Zest Oike.

sen.j: 祗園祭の山鉾巡行の辻回しが行われる（四条河原町から北上してきた山鉾が、烏丸御池方向へと向かっていく）。
sen.e: During the Gion-matsuri Festival, the parade of those Yama-hoko (festival floats of the Gion-matsuri) will change their direction by rotating the Yama-hoko at this intersection. (Those Yama-hoko touring from Sijo Kawaramachi toward north will change their direction to Karasuma Oike)

During the Gion-matsuri Festival, the parade of those Yama-hoko (festival floats of the Gion-matsuri) will change their direction by rotating the Yama-hoko at this intersection (those Yama-hoko touring from Sijo Kawaramachi toward north will change their direction to Karasuma Oike.)
sen.cmt: ピリオド位置を訂正しました。
sen.e: During the Gion-matsuri Festival, the parade of those Yama-hoko (festival floats of the Gion-matsuri) will change their direction by rotating the Yama-hoko at this intersection (those Yama-hoko touring from Sijo Kawaramachi toward north will change their direction to Karasuma Oike.)

sen.j: 京都市役所前の広場では、休日になるとフリーマーケットやイベントが行なわれる事がある。
sen.e: Occasionally, a flea market or an event is held at the plaza space in front of the Kyoto City Hall.
Occasionally, a flea market or an event is held at the plaza space in front of the Kyoto City Hall.
Occasionally, a flea market or an event is held at the plaza space in front of the Kyoto City Hall.

sen.j: - 京都市営地下鉄東西線の鉄道駅。
sen.e: This is the subway train station of Kyoto Municipal Subway Tozai (east-west) Line.
